column2: an A.M. Eatery////Snooze is a very solid brunch spot! I don't think it is worth the wait... But if you plan accordingly: place your name on the wait list
column3: have your phone fully juiced so that you can receive the text when your table is ready
column4: and go check out the Menil (or lounge at home if you're close by) while you wait
column5: you will be satisfied. If you wait there
